author: abehazbunjr
title: Tokenized Products for Shopify
description: Shopify and Woocommerce are major e-commerce platforms with no ability to utilize native tokens as utility, login or sale items.
solution: A plugin for Shopify and WooCommerce providing ability to mint tokens associated with Product, Customer or Discount data for re-use on site.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
